EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to users after they are registered
EmailTemplate.name: Thank You Email for Registering
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you {!Registered_User__c.First_Name__c} for Registration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Registered_User__c.First_Name__c},
Thank you so much for joining our mailing list. We will be sharing a lot of goodies in upcoming emails, but for the timing, please enjoy this $5 OFF coupon code for Starbucks COUPON CODE: STARBUCKS5 Please enjoy your favorite drink at Starbucks Thank you, Deepika Khanna
